title: Perrin numbers that are palindromic concatenations of two repdigits
abstract:
Let $ \{P_n\}_{n\geq 0} $ be the sequence of Perrin numbers defined by
$P_0=3$, $P_1=0$,$P_2=2$ and $P_{n+3}=P_{n+1}+P_{n}$ for all $n \geq 0$. In
this paper, we determine all Perrin numbers that are palindromic concatenations
of two repdigits.
